TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LowerCaseStringConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter
Public NotInheritable Class LowerCaseStringConverter Inherits TypeConverter
public ref class LowerCaseStringConverter sealed : System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供对将一个对象转换为小写字符串的支持。

span.span: Provides support to convert an object to a lowercase string.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许对象转换为小写的字符串。The class allows an object to be converted to a lowercase string. 此类还提供支持验证的对象类型可以转换为小写的字符串中之前进行转换。This class also provides support to verify that an object type can be converted to a lowercase string before the conversion is made. 方法实现的对象将作为一个参数接口。The methods of take as a parameter an object that implements the interface. 此接口提供有关组件的上下文信息。This interface provides contextual information about a component. 通常情况下，此接口用于在设计时提供有关设计时容器的信息。Typically, this interface is used at design time to provide information about a design-time container. 常用于类型转换。The is commonly used in type conversion.

span.span: Determines whether an object can be converted to a lowercase string based on the specified parameters.

returns.span: 如果参数描述的对象能够转换为小写字符串对象，则为 ；否则为 。

summary.span: 根据指定参数将对象从其原始值转换为小写字符串。

span.span: Converts an object from its original value to a lowercase string based on the specified parameters.
A lowercase string object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用实现的对象接口用作`ctx`参数。This method uses an object that implements the interface as the `ctx` parameter. 此接口提供有关组件的上下文信息。This interface provides contextual information about a component. 通常情况下，此接口用于在设计时提供有关设计时容器的信息。Typically, this interface is used at design time to provide information about a design-time container. 常用于类型转换。The is commonly used in type conversion. `ci`参数对象提供的区域性相关信息。The `ci` parameter object provides the culture-related information. `data`参数对象用作要转换的对象和生成的对象作为该方法完成后。The `data` parameter object acts as both the object to convert and the resulting object once the method is complete. 如果所需的自定义行为，重写此方法在派生类。Override this method in a derived class if custom behavior is required. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法。The following example demonstrates how to use this method.
